en: Peppa and George are at the playground with their friends.
zh: 佩奇和乔治和朋友们在操场上玩。

en: Candy Cat and Pedro Pony are on the climbing frame.
zh: 小猫凯迪和小马佩德罗在玩攀登架。

en: Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog, and Rebecca Rabbit are playing on the slide.
zh: 小羊苏西，小狗丹尼，小兔丽贝卡正在玩滑滑梯。

en: weeee!
Peppa is playing on the swing.
Mummy, Mummy!Push me! Please!
zh: 妈妈，妈妈！推我一下，好不好

en: Are you ready?
Yes, I want to go really high.
Higher, Mummy!
George wants to play on the swing.
Now, it's your turn, George.
Hold tight!
I want to push George.
Push George gently, Peppa.
Yes, Mummy.
Hold tight, George!
Oh, dear! Peppa has pushed George too high!
zh: 哦，糟糕了！佩奇把乔治推得太高了。

en: George does not like being up high.
Peppa! You know George is a bit scared of heights!
zh: 佩奇，你知道乔治他有点怕高的。

en: Sorry, George!
Let's play on the climbing frame!
Hello, Suzy!
Hello, Danny!
Hello, Peppa!
You are doing it all wrong!
This is the proper way to swing across!
zh: 这才是正确推秋千的方法。

en: Stand back!Ready, steady, go!
zh: 大家请往后站！准备好了，开始！

en: wheee! Look at me!
I'm flying like a bird!
zh: 我像鸟儿一样飞起来了！

en: Oh! I can't get out!
Peppa is stuck in the tire!
It's not funny!
Well, it does look a bit funny.
zh: 好吧，看上去确实有点好笑。

en: We'll have to pull you out.
Peppa's friends are helping to free her.
zh: 佩奇的朋友们都来帮忙把她拉出来。

en: Hurray!
Thank you, everyone.
George, do you want to play on the climbing frame?
zh: 乔治，你想不想玩攀登架？

en: The climbing frame is quite high.
George does not like being up high.
Sorry, George.Let's play on the slide.
zh: 对不起，乔治。我们一起去玩滑梯吧。

en: Yes! The slide!
Peppa loves the slide.Everyone loves the slide.
zh: 佩奇喜欢玩滑梯。每个人都喜欢玩滑梯。

en: Mummy! Daddy! Look at me!
Ready, steady, go!
George wants to play on the slide.
Are you sure, George? It is a bit high.
zh: 你确定吗，乔治？这可有点高呀。

en: Alright, I'll help you up the steps.
Oh, dear! It is a bit too high for George.
zh: 哦，天哦！这对乔治来说有点高。

en: Don't cry, George，I'll slide down with you.
zh: 不要哭，乔治，我和你一起滑下去。

en: Daddy, you're too big to go down the slide!
zh: 爸爸，你个头太大滑不下去的！

en: Don't be silly, Peppa,I'm not too big.
zh: 才不会呢，佩奇，我个头不大。

en: Stand back! Ready,steady, go!
Daddy Pig is stuck!
It's not funny!
It looks very funny, Daddy.
zh: 看起来非常的好笑，爸爸。

en: I suppose it is a bit funny.
zh: 我想也许真的有点好笑。

en: We'll have to push you down.
Daddy's tummy is just like a bouncy castle!
zh: 爸爸的肚子就像一个充气城堡。

en: George loves bouncing on Daddy's tummy.
zh: 乔治喜欢在爸爸的肚子上跳。

en: George isn't afraid of heights anymore!
